extracted_playbook.title: Identify Affected System and Version
extracted_playbook.description: Check if the system is running 5015-U8IHFT V1.012 or prior.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is the system running 5015-U8IHFT V1.012 or prior?
Can the system be upgraded to 5015-U8IHFT V2.011?

extracted_playbook.title: Upgrade to 5015-U8IHFT V2.011
extracted_playbook.description: Upgrade the system to 5015-U8IHFT V2.011 to mitigate the vulnerability.

extracted_playbook.title: Apply Security Best Practices
extracted_playbook.description: Implement security best practices as recommended by Rockwell Automation.

extracted_playbook.title: Minimize Network Exposure
extracted_playbook.description: Minimize network exposure for all control system devices and/or systems, ensuring they are not accessible from the internet.

extracted_playbook.title: Use Firewalls and VPNs
extracted_playbook.description: Locate control system networks and remote devices behind firewalls and isolate them from business networks. Use secure methods like VPNs for remote access, ensuring they are updated to the latest version.

extracted_playbook.title: Perform Impact Analysis and Risk Assessment
extracted_playbook.description: Conduct proper impact analysis and risk assessment before deploying defensive measures.

extracted_playbook.title: Report Suspected Malicious Activity
extracted_playbook.description: Follow established internal procedures to report suspected malicious activity to CISA for tracking and correlation against other incidents.

cve_id: Rockwell Automation 5015-U8IHFT V1.012 and prior vulnerability
